page.title: 17AMENITIES
page.content: The{HEALTH CENTRE}in Chacewater has been there for four to five years.It is run by {Dr.CRAN }and{Dr.GRIPPER.}7 people work there incuding a receptionist,two Doctors and soon they will have another.Also they have a district nurse, a health visitor and a McMillan nurse.The surgery covers an area of about 30 square miles from Blackwater to Twelveheads to Mount Hawke.The Surgery treats Minor injuries like burns, cuts, and taking stitches out. They roughly have about {299}patients a week, and there are about{3,000}patients on the register. Nurse Martin and the other people in the Health Centre work as a team and their primary concern is Health and care. Nurse Martin tends to 30 babies a day. She tends to 400 children under 5 and {1,000 }adults.She comes to school every 6 months to check eyes.
